entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Swan River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Swan River 11:00 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: -26.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -29.0°C
Wind: SW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:38 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:38 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
